sentences.en: I have to make a biannual report next Monday.
sentences.cn: 下周一我得作半年度报告.

sentences.en: Officials last month downplayed his chances of making the biannual and field world championships in August.
sentences.cn: 上个月官方对他八月份参加一年两次的国际田径大奖赛表示不乐观.

sentences.en: Our school doctor recommends a biannual visit to the dentist.
sentences.cn: 我们校医建议一年去看牙医两次.

sentences.en: The airfield, less than an hour's drive west of London, is home to Britain's biannual airshow.
sentences.cn: 该机场在伦敦以西, 不到两小时的车程, 是英国双年航空展的举办地.

sentences.en: The club has a biannual meeting.
sentences.cn: 这个俱乐部一年开两次会.

sentences.en: This article is the seventh biannual review on photometric analysis.
sentences.cn: 本文是《分析试验室》定期评述中“光度分析”的第七篇文章.

sentences.en: You will need to have a routine biannual examination.
sentences.cn: 你得接受一年两次的例行检查。
